# humanstxt.org/
# The humans responsible & technology colophon

# TEAM

	Antonio Villamarin -- http://ant.onio.org -- Mojacar, Almeria, Andalucia, Spain

# THANKS

	HTML Definitions -- HTML5 Boilerplate -- http://html5boilerplate.com
	JQuery Tabify, JQuery Elastic -- Jan Jarfalk -- http://www.unwrongest.com
	Reset CSS -- Eric Meyer -- http://meyerweb.com/eric/tools/css/reset/
	JavaScript -- JQuery -- http://www.jquery.com
	CSS Tabs & some components inspirated by -- Skeleton Framework -- http://www.getskeleton.com
	Modernzr -- http://modernizr.com/
	Fonts -- http://www.google.com/webfonts
	CSS minifier -- http://www.cssminifier.com/

# SITE

	Site: http://www.gridcss.com
	Last update: 2013/02/01
	Language: English / Castellano
	Doctype: HTML5
	IDE: Geany for linux
	Hosting: GitHub by git for linux
	Generator: Jekyll
	OS: Ubuntu 12.10

# TECHNOLOGY COLOPHON

    HTML: HTML5
    CSS: CSS3, Eric Meyer Reset
    JavaScript: jQuery, Tabify, Elastic, Modernizr
    crossdomain.xml, index headers, robots.txt: HTML5 Boilerplate
